data: We create art both on location and in our SoHo studio. Our hours of operation are Monday through Friday, from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
The store is located at 14 Wooster Street in SoHo.

We have recently completed significant on-site digitization projects for the Taller del Prado in Madrid, Spain, and the Centro Cultural Eduardo Le√≥n Jimenes Art Museum in Santiago, Dominican Republic.
